name: Alzheimer Society Waterloo Wellington - Kitchener
comment:
Networking for people affected by Alzheimer's disease or a related 
dementia, to a community of learning, services and support * one-on-one 
counselling * caregiver support groups * referral to community resources
 by phone, drop in, or home visit * First Link Learning Series offered 
regularly in various locations
